Policies

Homework

All homework assignments will be graded by a reader (i.e., not me).

Office Hours

If you're unable to attend my office hours, then feel free to send me an e-mail and we can set up an appointment to meet at a different time.

E-mails

I'm usually quick to respond to e-mails, so if you don't get a reply by the end of the day, feel free to send another one. Also, please address me as Steven.

Announcements

1/8/24 Please fill out this form to help me schedule office hours.
3/17/24Please fill out this form to help me schedule office hours during finals week.

Resources

  • Student Math Center
  • Desmos Graphing Calculator

Homework Solutions

  • Homework 1
    order statistics, sample statistics
  • Homework 2
    least squares regression, maximum likelihood estimation, method of moments
  • Homework 3
    Bayesian statistics, confidence intervals, estimators
  • Homework 4
    confidence intervals, difference of means
  • Homework 5
    confidence intervals, proportions
  • Homework 6
    hypothesis testing, means
  • Homework 7
    hypothesis testing, medians, power functions, proportions
  • Homework 8
    best critical regions, goodness-of-fit, likelihood ratio test
